trans-unit.source: The name appears as a headline in the frontend.
trans-unit.target: Nazwa pojawia się jako tytuł w frontendzie.

trans-unit.source:
The start date is used for pure information.
In the frontend this date will be displayed
It does not affect the start of counting!
When the field left blank will hide the row in frontend.
trans-unit.target:
Data rozpoczęcia używana jest tylko do celów informacyjnych.
Ta data będzie wyświetlana w frontendzie
Nie wpływa na rozpoczęcie liczenia!
Gdy to pole zostanie puste to pole w frontedzie zostanie ukryty.

trans-unit.source:
With the change of a user agent with a unique string and entry in this field can be prevented, that will count your own requests.
Detailed instructions, can be found in the Wiki.
trans-unit.target:
zmiana agenta użytkownika na unikalne słowo uzupełnienie tego pola może zapowiec, zliczaniu własnych rządań.
Szczegółowe instrukcje można znaleźć w Wiki.

trans-unit.source:
Each module can be assigned its own Template. Four different templates are included.
mod_visitors_fe_all
   All fields are included.
mod_visitors_fe_all_ajax
   All fields are included. (Ajax Refresh)
mod_visitors_fe_hits
   Here the visit rows were removed.
mod_visitors_fe_visits
   Here the hit rows were removed.
mod_visitors_fe_invisible
   Here, nothing is displayed. This template is used for a pure counting.

The module can detect and count the device/screen resolution and display it in the backend statistics.
In Germany, according to TDDDG §25, this is only permitted if the end user has consented on the basis of clear and comprehensive information.
There are exceptions to this. See: https://gesetz-tdddg.de/25-tdddg/

In other countries, the lawfulness of detecting the device/screen resolution should be checked before activation.
